content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions. However, according to historical data, some of the most memorable performances during Monday Night Football include:

1. The Chicago Bears' 1985 Super Bowl team's dominant win over the New York Giants on Monday Night Football.

2. Peyton Manning's record-breaking seven touchdown passes in the Denver Broncos' win over the Baltimore Ravens in 2013.

3. The Philadelphia Eagles' "Miracle at the Meadowlands" comeback win over the New York Giants in 2010.

4. Brett Favre's epic performance against the Oakland Raiders on Monday Night Football after his father's death in 2003.

5. The Miami Dolphins' "Hook and Lateral" play to beat the undefeated and heavily favored New England Patriots in 1982.
